message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know I'm losing value faster, so I'm taking a bit more upfront.  What do you say?
Alice, your initial offer significantly undervalues my position in the long run. I propose a more equitable split recognizing the impact of inflation on both our shares.
Bob, let's be realistic. My losses are accelerating faster than yours. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last offer, but I need to secure my position.
